lead_paragraph: Darren McFadden and the Oakland Raiders needed only two days of negotiations to complete a six-year, $60 million contract that ensures McFadden will be in training camp on time and not repeat the protracted holdout that derailed JaMarcus Russell’s rookie year in Oakland.
